snippet: Army prosecutors offered the first details of a rare criminal case against a general, alleging that he committed sex crimes against five women.
abstract: Army prosecutors offer details of rare criminal case against a general, alleging in a military hearing at Fort Bragg, NC, that Brig Gen Jeffrey Sinclair committed sex crimes agains five women, including four subordinates and a civilian; Sinclair faces possible courts-martial on charges.
lead_paragraph: Army prosecutors offered the first details of a rare criminal case against a general, alleging that he committed sex crimes against five women.

headline.main: North Carolina: Army Opens Sex Crimes Hearing for General
headline.print_headline: North Carolina: Army Opens Sex Crimes Hearing For General
